snippet: Eli Manning was in a jovial mood with David Letterman after fulfilling his Super Bowl M.V.P. obligations at Disney World.
abstract: Eli Manning was in a jovial mood with David Letterman after fulfilling his Super Bowl M.V.P. obligations at Disney World.
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning was in a jovial and relaxed mood with David Letterman on Monday after fulfilling his Super Bowl M.V.P. obligations at Disney World in Florida.

headline.main: The Lighter Side With Eli: Letterman and the Onion
